text: No part of any appropriation for the District of Columbia, except for public schools, shall be expended for printing or binding a schedule or list of supplies and materials for the furnishing of which contracts have been or may be awarded.

heading.catch_text: Appropriations for printing schedules or lists of supplies and materials.
